channel.title: ruby on The views expressed
channel.description: Recent content in ruby on The views expressed

item.title: Rubyist
item.description: include 'everyone' ruby_community.each do |rubyist| give hug if rubyist.accept? :hugs awesome.lightning_talk (rubyist self).pairing do write.test case test.status when :red code.write when :green code.refactor end end until code.happy round_of.drinks end
